mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn,wr.*,un.name name,emp.empname empname from dis_workordersign wr inner join sy_units un on wr.inputid=un.id inner join sy_emp emp on wr.inputpersonid=emp.id where wr.id=#{id} )

select count(*) from ( select rownum rn,wr.*,un.name name,un2.name as uname,emp.empname empname from dis_workordersign wr inner join sy_units un on wr.inputid=un.id inner join sy_emp emp on wr.inputpersonid=emp.id inner join sy_units un2 on wr.signunit=un2.id
and wr.id like concat(concat('%',#{id}),'%')
and wr.worksheetno like concat(concat('%',#{worksheetno}),'%')
)

select * from ( select rownum rn,wr.*,un.name name,un2.name as uname,emp.empname empname from dis_workordersign wr inner join sy_units un on wr.inputid=un.id inner join sy_emp emp on wr.inputpersonid=emp.id inner join sy_units un2 on wr.signunit=un2.id where wr.id=#{id} )

select count(*) from ( select rownum rn,wr.*,un.name name,emp.empname empname from dis_workordersign wr inner join sy_units un on wr.inputid=un.id inner join sy_emp emp on wr.inputpersonid=emp.id
and wr.worksheetno like concat(concat('%',#{worksheetno}),'%')
and empname like concat(concat('%',#{couriername}),'%')
and name like concat(concat('%',#{recipient}),'%')
)
mapper.insert: insert into BOS.DIS_WORKORDERSIGN (ID, WORKORDERID, WORKSHEETNO, WORKORDERTYPE, SIGNTYPE, COURIERINT, COURIERNAME, RECIPIENT, SIGNUNIT, SIGNTIME, INVALIDATEMARK, ABNORMALMARK, INPUTPERSONCODE, INPUTPERSONID, INPUTID, INPUTTIME) values (wsign_id.nextval, #{workorderid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{worksheetno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workordertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{signtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{courierint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couriername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{invalidatemark,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{abnormalmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputpersoncode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inputpersonid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inputid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inputtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into BOS.DIS_WORKORDERSIGN
ID,
WORKORDERID,
WORKSHEETNO,
WORKORDERTYPE,
SIGNTYPE,
COURIERINT,
COURIERNAME,
RECIPIENT,
SIGNUNIT,
SIGNTIME,
INVALIDATEMARK,
ABNORMALMARK,
INPUTPERSONCODE,
INPUTPERSONID,
INPUTID,
INPUTTIME,

#{worksheetno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{inputid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
